00053 CompositeOFScalarMultiply::CompositeOFScalarMultiply(double alp, 
00054                                            ObjectiveFunction* Obj,
00055                                            bool delete_of)
00056   : deleteObjFunc(delete_of)
00057 {
00058   objFunc=Obj;
00059   mAlpha=alp;
00060 }
00061 
00062 //Michael:  need to clean up here
00063 CompositeOFScalarMultiply::~CompositeOFScalarMultiply(){
00064   if (deleteObjFunc)
00065     delete objFunc;
00066 }
00067 
00068 ObjectiveFunction* CompositeOFScalarMultiply::clone() const
00069   { return new CompositeOFScalarMultiply( mAlpha, objFunc->clone(), true ); }
00070   
00071 void CompositeOFScalarMultiply::clear()
00072 {
00073   objFunc->clear();
00074 }

00076 void CompositeOFScalarMultiply::initialize_queue( Mesh* mesh,
00077                                                   MeshDomain* domain,
00078                                                   const Settings* settings,
00079                                                   MsqError& err )
00080 {
00081   objFunc->initialize_queue( mesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00082 }
00083 
00084 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::initialize_block_coordinate_descent( 
00085                                                        Mesh* mesh, 
00086                                                        MeshDomain* domain,
00087                                                        const Settings* settings,
00088                                                        PatchSet* user_set,
00089                                                        MsqError& err )
00090 {
00091   bool rval = objFunc->initialize_block_coordinate_descent( mesh, domain, settings, user_set, err );
00092   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00093 }
00094 
00095 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00096                                           PatchData& pd,
00097                                           double& value_out,
00098                                           bool free,
00099                                           MsqError& err )
00100 {
00101   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate( type, pd, value_out, free, err );
00102   value_out *= mAlpha;
00103   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00104 }
00105 
00106 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::evaluate_with_gradient( EvalType type, 
00107                                              PatchData& pd,
00108                                              double& value_out,
00109                                              std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00110                                              MsqError& err )
00111 {
00112   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate_with_gradient( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, err );
00113   value_out *= mAlpha;
00114   for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator i = grad_out.begin(); i != grad_out.end(); ++i)
00115     *i *= mAlpha;
00116   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( EvalType type, 
00120                                             PatchData& pd,
00121                                             double& value_out,
00122                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00123                                             std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& diag_out,
00124                                             MsqError& err )
00125 {
00126   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, diag_out, err );
00127   value_out *= mAlpha;
00128   for (size_t i = 0; i < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++i) {
00129     grad_out[i] *= mAlpha;
00130     diag_out[i] *= mAlpha;
00131   }
00132   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00133 }
00134 
00135 bool CompositeOFScalarMultiply::evaluate_with_Hessian( EvalType type, 
00136                                             PatchData& pd,
00137                                             double& value_out,
00138                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00139                                             MsqHessian& Hessian_out,
00140                                             MsqError& err )
00141 {
00142   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate_with_Hessian( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, Hessian_out, err );
00143   value_out *= mAlpha;
00144   for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator i = grad_out.begin(); i != grad_out.end(); ++i)
00145     *i *= mAlpha;
00146   Hessian_out.scale( mAlpha );
00147   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00148 }
00149 
00150 int CompositeOFScalarMultiply::min_patch_layers() const
00151   { return objFunc->min_patch_layers(); }
